default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: If possible, I'd like to stay in the kitchen, preferably in cold storage... ah, sorry! I didn't mean to trouble you. I promise not to do anything weird.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Shiver... was that what it feels like in absolute zero?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: From now on, whether in cooking or in battle, I will never doubt myself again!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: There's got to be a better candidate than me... right?

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: We survived...! Thanks to everyone's efforts.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: I always mess things up...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Please don't come over here!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: It's so cold...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: It's a bit hot today... Chief, I concocted a new flavor of shaved ice. Want to try it? You won't be disappointed.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Chief, you know which vegetable has the worst eyesight?... They all have equally bad eyesight, because vegetables don't have eyes! Haha... ha... I'm sorry I suck at everything...!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: I can't taste hot dishes, yet I dream of becoming a chef... sorry, you must think I'm weird.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: The DisCity Blue Ribbon Culinary School is the most prestigious cooking school of all time. Every student here will become a celebrity chef one day... everyone except me. I've repeated the same grade for three years already and still haven't been able to graduate...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: To pass the exams and be accepted by everyone, I turned my back on the recipes that had accompanied me all my life. I learned "normal" recipes and made what I could never taste... later, I obtained my degree, but lost something more precious.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I know my recipes aren't the kind that everyone likes... but... low-temperature dishes have their own unique flavors. I really don't want to give up on them!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: It's scary to be "different from everyone else"... if everyone else thinks something is sweet, you must also think that it's sweet... if everyone else thinks something is sour, you must also think that it's sour... otherwise, you will become the "weirdo"...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Thank you, Chief, for giving me a place to stay. Thank you for letting me cook whatever I want and for chatting with me, even though I make every conversation awkward... from now on, I will accommodate your wishes no matter what they are. I promise!

default.title: Idle
default.text: Looks like I'm no longer needed here. Hmm... can I take a look in the kitchen? Just a peek.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Eek! Ch-ch-chief... it's too hot...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Chief? Are you here to supervise me? I'm sorry, I won't use the freezer behind your back... really.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Um... can I shop for some ingredients on my way back?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I'm sorry, Chief, I think... I have a heatstroke...

default.title: Level Up
default.text: ... hmm? I think I sensed a bit of taste!

default.title: Deploy
default.text: ... are you sure you want to leave this to me?

chilling_hideaway.title: Obtain Attire
chilling_hideaway.text: This feels nice... Ah! Ch-Chief! Wh... when did you come? I'm sorry, but can I please stay here for a bit longer...? I'll definitely clean up the fridge later!

chilling_hideaway.title: Greeting
chilling_hideaway.text: Chief, would you care to join me? It's different from the icehouse of the Blue Ribbon Culinary School. It doesn't give you goosebumps at all! It feels just right.

chilling_hideaway.title: Ordinary Contact 1
chilling_hideaway.text: If anyone saw me like this, words about me being a "giant weirdo" will surely be spread even further. What? You think it's not bad? Hehehe... That's nice.

chilling_hideaway.title: Ordinary Contact 2
chilling_hideaway.text: I've got an idea! Before we go out to the pool, why don't we make some snow cones with these fruits? They'll be perfect for relieving summer heat!

chilling_hideaway.title: Idle
chilling_hideaway.text: One day, the strawberry cone and the chocolate cone swam together in a race. Guess who won? The answer is neither, because they both melted in the sea! Ah... I'm sorry... I must be delirious from the heat to tell this horrible joke... You don't have to force yourself to laugh!

chilling_hideaway.title: Annoyed
chilling_hideaway.text: Oh! Your hands are so cold, not quite the same as usual! It seems to be even more chilling than liquid nitrogen! Hmm? Is this... the power of the shackles? Amazing!

chilling_hideaway.title: Special Attention
chilling_hideaway.text: I thought I'd packed the right clothes for summer, but they are still not cool enough. I was this close to becoming one of the water vaporizers...
